user.title: Fill in your information
user.description:
SimpliSafe authenticates with Home Assistant via the SimpliSafe web app. Due to technical limitations, there is a manual step at the end of this process; please ensure that you read the [documentation]({docs_url}) before starting.

1. Click [here]({url}) to open the SimpliSafe web app and input your credentials.

2. When the login process is complete, return here and input the authorization code below.
